name: Fluidbook - Browse Facebook in a dedicated app
description: Fluidbook recognizes when you're visiting Facebook and redirects the request to Choosy for routing to your Fluid app. For more information, see http://www.engadget.com/2014/06/16/how-to-make-a-fluid-app-for-facebook-to-protect-your-online-priv/
author: Jamie Phelps
